label: Target Mapping
description: Map specific protein targets to biological systems and desired modulations (Kerry honey anti-inflammatory specific)

defaultOutputs.name: Protein Target
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The specific protein being targeted (e.g. COX-2, 5-LOX, iNOS).

defaultOutputs.name: Biological System
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The biological system or pathway associated with the target (e.g. Human inflammatory pathway, Leukotriene synthesis).

defaultOutputs.name: Desired Modulation
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The intended effect on the target (e.g. Inhibition, Weak inhibition).

defaultOutputs.name: Corresponding Assay
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The assay used to measure the effect.

defaultOutputs.name: Metric Used
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The metric used for measurement (e.g. IC50, %I).

defaultOutputs.name: Rationale for Deterrence
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Reasoning behind targeting this protein for anti-inflammatory activity.

defaultOutputs.name: Crystalized Structure Available?
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Whether a crystal structure exists for the target (Yes/No).

defaultOutputs.name: ChEMBL ID
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The ChEMBL identifier for the target.

configSchema.label: Target List
configSchema.tooltip: List of protein targets to analyze.
